comments.body:
these might be more readable if you define above:

```
userFoo := user.DefaultInfo{Name: "foo"}
userAdmin := user.DefaultInfo{Name: "admin"}
userGrpAdmin :=  &user.DefaultInfo{Groups: []string{"admin"}}
...
```

and then just put here:

```
authorizer.AttributesRecord{User: &userFoo, Verb: "get", Path: "/apis"},
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +159,163 @@			},
			shouldPass: []authorizer.Attributes{
				authorizer.AttributesRecord{User: &user.DefaultInfo{Name: "foo"}, Verb: "get", Path: "/apis"},
				authorizer.AttributesRecord{User: &user.DefaultInfo{Groups: []string{"bar"}}, Verb: "get", Path: "/apis"},
				authorizer.AttributesRecord{User: &user.DefaultInfo{Name: "admin"}, Verb: "get", Path: "/apis"},
